title: I see dark color distortion on the display and it is very evident for black color. This is Pixel 3XL
content:
I am facing issues with my google pixel 3 xl off lately. The black color in the screen looks distorted, be it an image or a video. 

My phone never fell or whatsoever. I use it very gently. Not sure how come all of a sudden this issue appeared. It's less than 2 years old.

Attaching an image to give you an idea...
